price: (53) Did they suggest it to them?[1547] Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
footnotes: [1547]- i.e., Did the former disbelievers pass on these words to the Makkans so that they repeat the same expressions?

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
